home.card_1_text: More than 15 years in the market

card_4.text_4: We are ready to recommend us

about_us.title: ABOUT US
about_us.text_1: You are welcomed by LLC 'Company Doctor' Company.We have been successfully working in the Russian market since 2006 and have established ourselves as a worthy manufacturer and seller.
about_us.text_2: In our assortment, you can find quality products made of natural materials - wool (camel, dog, sheep and yak wool) produced in Russia.Our goods are certified and medical devices have registration certificates.Each of our products is packed in proprietary packaging, which allows fakes to exclude.
about_us.text_3: In addition to medical-preventive, medical products, thermal underwear, homemade clothes and shoes made of natural wool, now we are actively expanding the line of classic clothing for men and women from natural high-quality materials!In our classic assortment: jumper, sweaters, poncho, as well as some outerwear - jackets, shirts -jackets.We try to follow trends and satisfy the taste of a buyer of any age!
about_us.text_4: Our grateful buyers are also lovers of high -quality natural clothes, outdoor activities (fishing, campaigns), summer residents and summer residents and everyone who appreciates the gifts of nature in everyday things.People Plussize are our regular customers.We also get a lot of reviews from people whose work is related to being on the street and who lives in the cold regions of our country.
about_us.text_5: With our products made of natural wool - comfort will be provided at 100%!
about_us.text_6: Also, LLC 'Center Doctor' also works with wholesale customers.  We offer a wide range of products of a wide size row, an understandable system of discounts, a warehouse in Moscow and a quick shipment.

delivery.title: Shipping and payment
delivery.text_1: We thank you for the choice of our online store of the company Center Doctor LLC - a manufacturer of high -quality goods and clothes made of natural materials - wool (camel, dog, sheep and yak wool) produced in Russia.
delivery.text_2: Getting the goods directly from the manufacturer is the best guarantee of the quality and authenticity of the product.We will be happy to deliver the selected product at a convenient time for you.
delivery.text_3: We provide delivery of the choice from our own courier and 3 transport companies: Russian Post, SDEK, Boxberry.
delivery.text_4: Delivery of goods when choosing the method of delivery by the Courier of the online store is carried out within the Moscow Ring Road from 10-00 to 18-00 from Monday to Friday.
delivery.text_5: The delivery date is agreed with the manager of the online store.
delivery.text_6: Наши курьеры привезут Вам на выбор до 5-ти единиц товара.
delivery.text_7: The cost of delivery is 350 rubles.
delivery.text_8: Payment for goods when choosing a delivery method “Courier of an online store” can be made in different ways: payment by card or cash courier.
delivery.text_9: You can also choose a delivery method “Delivery SDEK”, “Delivery Boxberry”, “Delivery of Russian Post”.
delivery.text_10: The delivery time depends on the selected transport company, the delivery tariff at the time of placing the order.ng the order.
delivery.text_11: The calculation of the exact cost of delivery of your order will be automatically made in the basket at the time of placing the order.
delivery.text_12: When choosing the delivery methods “Delivery SDEK”, “Delivery Boxberry”, “Delivery of Russian Post” preparation of goods (cost of goods + transportation costs) is carried out.
delivery.sub-title_2: 2. Доставка в Москву за МКАД, Московскую область и регионы РФ
delivery.text_13: Предоставляем доставку на выбор от 3 транспортных компаний: Почта России, СДЭК, Boxberry.
delivery.text_14: The delivery time depends on the selected transport company, the delivery tariff at the time of placing the order.
delivery.text_15: The calculation of the exact cost of delivery of your order will be automatically made in the basket at the time of placing the order.
delivery.text_16: When choosing the delivery methods “Delivery SDEK”, “Delivery Boxberry”, “Delivery of Russian Post”, the prepayment of the goods (the cost of goods + transportation costs) is carried out.
delivery.text_17: At the moment, we do not deliver goods with cash on delivery !!!Delivery by transport companies is carried out only with 100% prepayment (cost of goods + transportation costs) by bank transfer.

discount.title: Actions
discount.text_2: 30% discounts on a selective assortment of clothing
discount.duration: The promotion is valid from 05.02.2024 to 31.12.2024

return_items.title: Purchase returns
return_items.text_1: 1) The buyer has the right to refuse the goods ordered and/or paid to him in the online store, at any time before it is received, and after receiving-within 14 days.If claims arise regarding the quality of the goods, present them within 10 calendar days from the date of receipt.
return_items.text_2: 2) The buyer is not entitled to abandon the paid and accepted goods of proper quality, which has individually defined properties.The seller has the right: not to accept claims on the returned product of the proper quality specified in the list of non -food goods of good quality, not subject to return or exchange approved by the Decree of the Government of the Russian Federation from 19.01.1998 № 55.
return_items.text_3: 3) When returning or exchanging goods of good quality, the buyer must comply with the following conditions: the goods must be clean, without traces of dust, without traces of operation, without damage, without loss of commodity, in the original packaging.
return_items.text_4: 4) In accordance with paragraph 2 of “The List of Penetest Products of the Proper quality, which are not subject to return or exchange for similar goods of other sizes, forms, dimensions, style, colors or configuration”, approved by Decree of the Government of the Russian Federation dated 01/19/1998 No. 55.
return_items.text_5: 5) If the seller was delivered by an order of inadequate quality, the buyer undertakes to refuse the goods at the time of delivery and inform the seller by calling +7 (916) 800-13-16 or the email address info@doCtor-tm.ru.
return_items.text_6: 6) For a return/exchange of goods, the buyer is obliged to agree with the store manager and send the return/exchanged product (order for return/exchange) by the method agreed with the manager: mailing or courier service or deliver otherwise at the following address: 127282, Russia, Moscow, Moscow, MoscowPolynaya St. 31g, p. 1, phone +7 (916) 800-13-16.Working hours: Mon-PN from 10 to 18.
return_items.text_7: The order for a refund/exchange should be attached:
return_items.text_9: - commodity and cash receipt, or other documents confirming the purchase of goods.
return_items.text_10: 7) The buyer must provide the seller or in writing to the return of goods of inadequate quality at the address: 127282, Russia, Moscow, Polar D. D 31g, p. 1, or in electronic e-mail address info@doCtor-tm.ru.The requirement can be drawn up in free form with the mandatory indication of the customer’s contact details that coincide with the goods indicated when ordering the goods, the name of the returned goods and the reasons for the return.The buyer has the right to ask all questions to the seller by phone:+7 (916)800-13-16.
return_items.text_11: 8) In accordance with Art.22 of the Law of the Russian Federation No. 2300-I “On the Protection of Consumer Rights”, the amount paid by the buyer for goods of inadequate quality is subject to return to the buyer within 10 calendar days from the date of presentation of the relevant claim.The refund is carried out in cash with courier, which takes the goods in Moscow.In other cases, when the goods were paid by a bank card, the money fund is returned to the buyer's account within 5 business days.

optovic.text_cert: We have registration certificates for medical products!
optovic.text_fast_ogruz: Our warehouse is located in Moscow. We ship within 3 working days. We cooperate with various transport companies: Delovye Linii, Baikal, Kit, etc.
optovic.text_5: The minimum order amount is 50,000 rubles. We work with different types of clients: Wholesalers/Fairs/Retail chains/Joint purchases
optovic.text_6: We work with different types of clients: Wholesalers/Fairs/Retail chains/Joint purchases
optovic.title_4: REGISTER AND GET ACCESS TO WHOLESALE PRICES:
optovic.title_5: WHAT ELSE DO OUR WHOLESALE CUSTOMERS LIKE ABOUT WORKING WITH US:
optovic.text_7: They like the quality of the goods. There are different categories of goods. The uniqueness of the goods. The loyalty program satisfies, a wide range of sizes from 42 to 68 of the Russian size. Loyal, competent managers.
optovic.text_8: The quality of our products is confirmed by 5,772 reviews on our products on wildberries.ru, as well as more than 76,000 sold only on the marketplace.
optovic.text_9: With us, you can order products without size ranges, without assortment by colors and sizes.
optovic.text_10: Doctor-TM provides professional modern photos of goods for its wholesale customers. This is a huge advantage in a world where people 'buy' with their eyes.
